ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Fixed issue #134 (cost per unit not saved) - Restyled UI navigation. Added side menu (opens by clicking the upper left HomeGenie button) - Improved Sensor, Switch and Shutter widgets (PR #172 #173 #174) - Fixed Statistics Engine bug with parsing/passing wrong timerange values (resulting in totally wrong graphics)
